about: Matihaat.com is an organic marketplace that connects customers with high-quality natural and eco-friendly products.
mission: To promote healthy living by offering 100% organic products sourced directly from trusted farmers and producers.
shipping: We deliver orders within 3-5 business days anywhere in India.
return_policy: Returns are accepted within 7 days of delivery if the product is unopened and unused.
contact: For any assistance, you can reach us at support@matihaat.com or call +880123456789.

faqs.question: Do you sell only organic products?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in 100% organic and eco-friendly products from verified suppliers.
